embeds.title: About Exton Member Pass
embeds.description: With Member Pass, you can access the Twitter Monitor and other exclusive features right from our Discord. Get early scam alerts, special perks, and stay ahead in the Web3 game. Whether you're here for personal safety or just want an edge in the space, Member Pass has you covered.

embeds.title: Tiers
embeds.description:
:warning: *Repeated checks don't count. For more details, see our [docs](https://exton-scam-tracker.gitbook.io/docs) to review our terms and services.*

:warning: *Also Spots are limited to maintain optimal server performance and ensure dedicated support for all users*

fields.name: Seeker (~~$38.97~~ → $<price3months-seeker> for 3 months! :tada: or $<pricePerMonth-seeker> per month)
fields.value:
:white_check_mark: Unlimited Twitter Monitor (no cap – in beta)
:white_check_mark: Access to exclusive Seeker giveaways
:white_check_mark: Special Seeker role

:hourglass_flowing_sand: Only <spotsLeft-seeker> spots available

fields.name: Pioneer (~~$70.83~~ → $<price3months-pioneer> for 3 months! :tada: or $<pricePerMonth-pioneer> per month)
fields.value:
:white_check_mark: Unlimited username history checks via DM or on Exton’s official Discord
:white_check_mark: Unlimited Twitter Monitor (no cap – in beta)
:white_check_mark: Access to exclusive Pioneer giveaways
:white_check_mark: Special Pioneer role

:hourglass_flowing_sand: Only <spotsLeft-pioneer> spots available
